name: Airtime
description:
This game is a submission of the Weekly hour Gam Jam based on theme : Gravity is a habit that is hard to shake off

I can't spend as time as I would on this project ... so I choose to deal with a modest implement of a flappy bird like.

----------------------------------- How to play -------------------------------------

Only one key to play : the Up arrow to go up !

becarfull the more longer you fly, the more shorter become the funnel.
